snippet: Investigators are looking into the possibility that the man accused in an arson spree acted because his mother faced the prospect of being sent back to Germany.
abstract: Investigators are looking into the possibility that Harry Burkhart, man accused in Los Angeles-area arson spree, acted because his mother Dorothee faces the prospect of extradition to her native Germany to face fraud charges.
lead_paragraph: Investigators are looking into the possibility that the man accused in an arson spree acted because his mother faced the prospect of being sent back to Germany.
